colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B 'GAL 'BREL GYI RNAM GZHAG NGES PAR BYED PA'I TSUL 'DI NI, RJE BTZUN DAM PA KUM RA MA TI'I ZHAL NAS DANG, SNYIGS DUS KYI THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO RJE RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI GSUNG GI BDUD RTZI'I YUN RING DU MYANGS PA RIGS PA SMRA BA DAR MA RIN CHEN GYIS 'BROG RI BO CHE DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA RIN CHEN CHOS RGYAL LO, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD NAS DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SVA STI, ,RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI GSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR KUN DGA' DHARMA GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
